text: Veruyushchiye! Kto iz vas sdelayetsya otstupnikom ot svoyego veroustava, na mesto tekh Bog postavit lyudey, kotorykh On budet lyubit' i kotoryye Yego budut lyubit'; kotoryye budut dobroserdechny k veruyushchim i surovy k nevernym; revnostno budut podvizat'sya v voynakh na puti Bozh'yem, ne budut boyat'sya poritsaniya poritsayushchego. Takova blagost' Boga: On proyavlyayet yeyo k tomu, komu khochet; Bog vseob"yemlyushch, znayushch
